細心、認真負責、在持續單一的工作性質中也能發掘樂趣樂於學習新事物良好的電腦操作與基礎資訊能力每週至少能進辦公室三天喜歡吃吃喝喝，因為我們有吃不完的零食櫃跟豐富的下午茶熱愛狗狗貓貓，因為公司每天都有狗狗貓貓陪你一起工作
company_address: 105台北市松山區民權東路三段178號4樓
company_about: Tomofun 是一間國際化的寵物科技新創公司，由 Victor Chang 及 Maggie Cheung 共同成立，並由趨勢科技創辦人 Steve 作為 Mentor，運用最先進的技術-IoT物聯網、AI人工智慧、雲端大數據等，致力於帶給全世界寵物飼主源源不絕的歡樂與創新！Furbo 丟零食狗狗攝影機是我們推出的第一個革命性產品，讓飼主透過手機隨時隨地與狗狗遠端互動，解決當主人不在寵物身邊時的焦慮，還能進一步追蹤和分析狗狗的行為，真正實踐寵物就是家人、永遠緊緊相依的願景。Furbo不只在台灣受注目，更在全世界超過五十個國家熱銷，於美國、加拿大、英國及日本等全球10國亞馬遜上，成為最暢銷狗狗攝影機，是至今最成功的寵物科技新創品牌。我們持續開發世界級的產品、拓展國際市場，因而決定擴大延攬擁有企圖心的研發及行銷高手，與我們一同透過創新改變寵物與主人的生活。目前 Tomofun 在美國、德國慕尼黑、日本東京、台灣台北、菲律賓馬尼拉皆有團隊夥伴。隨著銷售版圖的擴增，我們不斷地獲得許多知名媒體報導與肯定(Forbes, Techcrunch, Inc., The New York Times, WIRED, CNBC…等)，也吸引了亞馬遜等大型企業主動洽詢合作機會． 並且於美國知名脫口秀節目”The Ellen show”上被譽為「所有愛狗人士的亞馬遜夢想購物清單第一名」。Tomofun 團隊重視五大文化：OCAFE - Open-minded、Customer Love、Agile、Fun、Explore。在這裡歡迎帶寵物一起上班，團隊每個人都是掌握自己工作與生活平衡的主人！隨著公司不斷茁壯，我們也期許團隊每個人一起成長，成為各領域的佼佼者。如果你也認同我們的熱情與理念，現在就加入我們，一起創造更多與毛孩子相伴的幸福生活吧！

title: Recruitment Consultant Intern — 人才招募顧問實習生 (提供轉正職機會)
company_name: Cake
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
關於 Cake 
Cake 是 2016 年成立於台灣的國際人才社群，以「聚焦人才的價值與歸屬」為核心，提供履歷與作品集 AI 工具、求職攻略、職場交流社群資源及國際化工作機會，全方位滿足職涯發展中的所有需求。Cake 在全球已擁有超過 700 萬名使用者，並與超過 10,000 家企業合作刊登職缺，幫助每個人才在不同職涯階段都能找到最合適的歸屬！
 
選擇 Cake 人才招募顧問團隊的理由
你將與一支擁有豐富技術能力背景及招募經驗的團隊夥伴共事並學習，與我們一起重新塑造人才招募的市場！
獵頭是什麼？獵人頭 (Headhunter) 工作內容、職涯發展一次告訴你！在Cake當獵頭是甚麼樣子? 聽聽Senior Manager Nick怎麼說！專訪 Cake 招募顧問 Tina｜溫暖搭起人才市場供需的獵頭職涯專訪 Cake 招募顧問 Candice｜每段經歷都是未來的養分專訪 Cake 獵頭實習生 Chris｜轉正職心路歷程、面試過程分享！專訪 Cake 獵頭實習生 Teddy｜工作內容、實習心得大公開！
  
職缺介紹
身為 Cake 的招募顧問實習生，你將與我們的招募顧問團隊一起協助 Cake 的企業客戶媒合適合的求職者，幫助企業達到招募和商業拓展目標。這份工作需要大量的與人選和企業溝通，傾聽他們需求；幫助企業找人的同時，也能幫助人選達到下一個職涯里程碑。
如果你希望朝業務職位發展，這個機會將能讓你學習基礎和進階的業務技巧、以及與企業和人才應對的能力、並了解人才市場的運作方式。透過大量的 cold call/cold email 訓練，並與我們經驗豐富的顧問合作，相信能幫助你建立扎實的業務及人才識別能力！
 
職務內容
企業端招募需求之確認協助尋找及評估潛在之合適人選人選與企業之媒合作業協助團隊達成其業務目標
requirements:
能力需求
良好的中文口語及書寫能力善於溝通，好與人交流邏輯清晰，能夠釐清確切的企業人才需求能夠自發性在無高壓監督的環境下有效工作對新創產業充滿熱情，認同新創企業的營運模式一週能配合至少 3 天；實習至少6 個月大四、碩二生（最後一學年）優先考量
 
加分能力
良好的英文口語及書寫能力擁有銷售之相關工作經驗
company_address: Taipei, Taiwan
company_about: Established in 2016 in Taiwan, Cake is an international talent community and platform providing comprehensive solutions for job seekers. By offering AI tools for resumes and portfolios, job search strategies, networking resources, and international job opportunities, Cake meets all needs in career development. With over 7 million users worldwide and collaborations with over 10,000 companies, Cake helps talent find the most suitable place at different stages of their careers.

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】海外實習-AOI AI軟體工程師
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER Program
LIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fab
----【專案主題】SMT AOI人工智能缺陷識別攻堅計劃ps.每專案包含3-4位實習生
【專案內容】
數據收集與整理：廣泛採集生產線上不同批次、不同型號產品的AOI檢測圖像數據，涵蓋正常產品與各類缺陷產品圖像。對收集到的數據進行標註，明確缺陷類型、位置、尺寸等信息，構建高質量的缺陷圖像數據集，為AI模型訓練提供數據基礎。AI算法選型與優化：評估多種適合圖像識別的AI算法，如卷積神經網絡（CNN）及其變體，結合SMT缺陷識別特點，選擇最適配的算法框架。針對SMT檢測場景，對算法進行針對性優化，調整網絡結構、參數設置等，提升算法對SMT缺陷的識別性能。模型訓練與驗證：使用整理好的數據集對選定的AI模型進行訓練，通過大量樣本學習，讓模型掌握不同缺陷的特徵。訓練過程中採用交叉驗證、數據增強等技術，防止模型過擬合，提高模型的泛化能力。利用獨立的測試數據集對訓練好的模型進行驗證，評估模型的準確率，誤報率等關鍵指標，根據驗證結果進一步優化模型。系統集成與測試：將優化後的AI模型集成到現有的AOI設備中，對集成後的系統進行全面測試，確保AI模型與AOI硬件設備穩定協同工作。在生產線上進行小批量試生產測試，收集實際生產中的檢測數據，驗證系統在真實生產環境下的性能表現，及時解決出現的問題。


【工作內容】
軟體開發（與MTD團隊合作）測試數據模擬訓練。測試數據分析。

【實習地點】將於光寶海外據點實習，會於面談時與人選通知
requirements: 【Hardskill】深入掌握機器學習、深度學習理論與算法，如卷積神經網絡（CNN）、循環神經網絡（RNN）。熟悉圖像信號處理知識，包括圖像濾波、特徵提取、圖像增強等。熟練掌握 Python、C++ 等編程語言，能夠高效地實現算法邏輯和數據處理。精通 PyTorch、TensorFlow 等深度學習框架，能夠快速搭建、訓練和優化 AI 模型。掌握數據庫原理和操作，如 MySQL、SQL Server 等，能夠設計和管理項目中的數據存儲和檢索。熟悉網絡通信協議和多線程編程技術，實現軟件與硬件設備之間的通信和數據交互，以及系統的高效運行。【Others】有工業自動化軟體、圖像檢測軟體等相關項目開發經驗，熟悉軟體項目的開發流程和管理方法。了解SMT生產流程和AOI檢測原理，以便開發出符合實際需求的軟體系統。了解SMT AOI AI專案所涉及的技術領域和業務流程，能夠對項目進行有效的跟進和作業。
company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】海外實習-生產製造工業工程師

----【專案主題】機動線單位產能提升ps.每專案包含3-4位實習生
【專案內容】
通過物流設計，工位排布，防呆治具的使用提升線平衡率。通過材料、製程品質改善，減少報廢與維修提升良率及單位產出。通過改善設備良率及稼動率提升單位產出。通過測試程序的優化，減少測試時間。

工業工程/機械工程熟悉 AutoCAD。掌握精益生產（Lean Production）方法論。修讀過生產運作管理、工程經濟學課程。
company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】海外實習-AI/軟體工程師
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER Program
LIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fab
----
【專案主題】回焊爐AI調溫ps.每專案包含3-4位實習生
【專案內容】1. 實現數據庫自動收錄溫度數據，能快速調取歷史數據並且通過歷史數據創建AI模型。2. 通過AI模型軟體的預測功能，可以模擬出重測的結果，減少試錯的機率，大幅減少設備調溫的時間。



【工作內容】
負責項目深度學習應用核心模塊、算法開發。參與項目需求分析、設計及開發、交付，保證系統的穩定性與性能。負責需求文檔、設計文檔、項目文檔的編寫。

【實習地點】  將於光寶海外據點實習，會於面談時與人選通知
requirements:
【Hardskill & Softskill】
電子電氣及其自動化、計算機科學、信息技術、機器學習有良好的研究背景和成果，對算法研究興趣濃厚，工作能力強，具備創造性思維。具備良好的團隊合作和溝通能力。具備較強的編程能力，精通主流編程語言，C++/Java/Python等。

job_description: 【常日班】➊封裝製程類-濺鍍、黃光、電鍍、蝕刻、切割、挑揀製程站點-新產品、新製程開發與導入協助-製程穩定性監控與維護-製程異常排除與改善-實驗規劃與資料分析➋封裝設備類-濺鍍、黃光、切割、挑揀製程站點-機台異常排除與妥善率管理-機台改善計畫與執行-異常分析與改善➌測試產品開發類-工程品測試驗證、試量產-生產異常維修與處置-產品相關-產品良率驗證與製程改善-測試程式開發➍測試設備類-機台設備移裝機事宜-線上異常處理/排除-跨機卡異常處理-改善及效率提升執行➎品質工程類-執行內部稽核專案-品質課程設計-工具開發應用建立系統-協助處內專案推動【輪班】➊封裝製程類-濺鍍、黃光、切割、挑揀製程站點  -製程穩定性監控與維護  -製程異常排除與改善  -工程實驗與資料蒐集分析➋封裝設備類-濺鍍、黃光、切割、挑揀製程站點  -封裝機台維護與保養  -現場機台異常排除  -治工具維護➌測試產品開發類  -工程品測試驗證、試量產.  -生產異常維修與處置-產品相關.  -產品良率驗證與製程改善.➍測試設備類  -測試機台維護與保養  -現場機台異常排除  -治工具維護

company_about:
公司簡介
頎邦科技為擁有「覆晶封裝技術」與「晶片尺寸封裝(CSP；Chip Scale Package)」此二類先進技術之專業封裝廠商，不論是自行販賣或代工生產，在數量上佔世界舉足地位。對於封裝方式進入輕薄、短小的要求時，國內獨缺凸塊製作之產業，本公司乃投入凸塊之代工並延續後段封裝之服務。本公司為國內凸塊領域進展最快，業績屢創新高。
其產品線的規劃可完全滿足未來封裝的主流需求。本公司之產品產製技術，舉凡金凸塊及錫鉛凸塊封裝、捲帶式接合封裝及晶圓級封裝技術，皆係由本公司技術團隊自行研發而得，並以自有研發技術為基礎，輔以國際半導體大廠在產品認證過程之實務製程經驗，使得本公司具有領先同業量產凸塊產品之優勢，並可提供凸塊代工客戶Total Solution的解決方案。為了因應半導體封裝對多腳化、高效能、高電性傳輸與高散熱性之需求，除持續投入可觀研發經費金凸塊產品製程、無電電鍍製程、COF封裝技術及無鉛產品等領域外，為加速研發技術能力之提升，同時與國內工研院及學校等研究機構單位及國外各半導體大廠進行技術交流與合作，擴大現有產品線與製程技能，以擁有全方位之封裝技術解決能力。

經營理念

創造一個兼具成就感與幸福感的生命共同體

主要商品 / 服務項目
公司主要產品介紹：
1. 金屬凸塊(Wafer Bumping Service)
2. 金凸塊(Gold Bump)
3. 錫鉛凸塊(Solder Bump)
4. 捲帶式軟板封裝(Tape Carrier Packaging)
5. 捲帶式薄膜覆晶(Chip On Film)
6. 玻璃覆晶封裝(Chip On Glass)
7. 覆晶(Flip Chip)
8. 捲帶式封裝載板(Tape)
營業項目主要內容：
本公司營業項目為晶圓上金凸塊(Gold Bump)及錫鉛塊(Solder Bump)之代工服務，乃先進封裝如:Flip Chip BGA、TAB所必須之過程。其中金凸塊及TAB組裝為LCD模組所必要，近年國內投入仟億以上資金發展TFT-LCD(薄膜液晶顯示器模組)相關之零配件產業。頎邦科技是目前國內唯一有能力完成LCD之驅動之IC全程封裝測試之公司。目前正處於快速成長的階段，估計往後10年內，台灣仍是全世界LCD主要供應地區及使用地區，前景看好。
本公司競爭之優勢為：
(1) 擁有國內外驅動IC大廠客戶群。
(2) 完整之凸塊及先進構裝研發團隊。
(3) 國內唯一提供完整解決方案的LCD驅動IC專業封裝大廠。
(4) 產能遙遙領先國內同業，經濟規模顯著提昇。
(5) 擴大原物料之採購議價能力，有助生產成本之降低。
(6) 整合業界大廠的管理資源與技術。
(7) 自主的產品與設備製造技術能力，可充分發揮降低成本優勢。福利制度

company_about:
BookAI is an innovative AI-powered reading assistant(and companion) designed to revolutionize the way we learn, work, and explore knowledge. By integrating advanced knowledge mapping with artificial intelligence, it delivers personalized reading solutions and serves as a cutting-edge knowledge search engine for readers, authors, and publishers. With BookAI, a smarter future begins today.
BookAI 是「智慧書僮」，一款創新的人工智慧閱讀助手，重新定義閱讀體驗。透過結合先進的知識地圖技術與人工智慧，為教育、工作及研究提供個人化的閱讀服務。本系統可嵌入電子書應用程式，並作為知識搜尋引擎使用。BookAI 藉由有意義的提問擔任知識導覽員，協助使用者更有效率地理解書籍內容，同時發掘不同知識之間的連結。

company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

title: 品牌電商行銷企劃執行(台北行銷部)
company_name: 海安生物科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description: 『漁嗜嚐』為海安生技創立之品牌，為的就是更能直接和消費者溝通。母公司海安水產於2015年成立，成立前已經致力於鰻魚市場經營多年。最初從一尾一尾由海裡捕撈上岸鰻苗養殖開始，歷經鰻魚從鰻線、幼鰻、成鰻各階段，由鰻魚養殖、買賣、加工，一步步紮實的走到鰻魚保健食品的開發。我們認為健康該是從鞏固根本開始 從日常三餐、保健食品攝取做起。因此，我們期盼漁嗜嚐產品能從日常三餐、保健食品一點一滴，為你照顧好家人的健康，替每一位認真生活的你提供全力的支持，成為您最值得信賴的智慧營養補充品牌。更多關於漁嗜嚐官方網站：https://www.eelee.com.tw粉絲團：https://www.facebook.com/fisheating** 公司總部位於台南市安定區，此職務上班地點為【台北行銷部門】，位於台北車站旁，距捷運台北車站步行僅3分鐘，交通便利，通勤方便 ! ------★ 需喜愛社群媒體、有自己經營社群帳號，並且喜歡線上購物 ★【工作內容】1. 協助進行市場調查、資料蒐集與分析。2. 協助行銷活動執行，如：電商平台操作( 91APP、MOMO、樂天、Pinkoi )、與設計溝通活動刊物需求、活動細節溝通等等。3. 負責行銷活動相關行政庶務工作，如會議安排、資料整理、文件歸檔、溝通協調。4. 協助社群平台內容發想與排程，支援社群活動執行與成效追蹤。5. 協助行銷活動進度追蹤與時程管理，定期彙整專案進度報告。【必備條件】1. 具備基礎企劃概念與邏輯思維。2. 心思細膩、具責任感，能有效完成主管交辦事項並掌握工作進度。
company_address: 台南市安定區安定里9-5號
company_about:
-緣起-
『漁嗜嚐』為海安生技創立的品牌，為的就是更能直接和消費者溝通。母公司海安水產於2015年成立，成立前已經致力於鰻魚市場經營多年。最初從一尾一尾由海裡捕撈上岸鰻苗養殖開始，歷經鰻魚從鰻線、幼鰻、成鰻各階段，由鰻魚養殖、買賣、加工，一步步紮實的走到鰻魚保健食品的開發。
『漁嗜嚐』取自『漁市場』之諧音，創辦人初期創業跑遍全台灣漁市場找尋客戶，各大市場裡總是有令人意想不到的美味，但有一個共通點---新鮮。這也是闆娘取名漁嗜嚐想要傳達的精神之一，新鮮美味好吃。
-我們的堅持-
在養殖過程中，每次與養殖戶的交流，讓我們更加了解如何判斷鰻魚的品質，從而形成了我們現在的3大堅持：
1.堅持實地前往養殖戶確認每尾鰻魚餵食狀況，確保鰻魚健康程度
2.堅持採用台灣在地養殖檢驗合格鰻魚
3.堅持多一道淨化程序，確保鰻魚無腥味無土味
-從守護家人開始：鰻給力的初心與承諾-
創辦人有一位穩定的常客住在深山，有一天他好奇詢問山上哪來吃鱸鰻的人？原來這位常客掌握了一個古老的鱸鰻熬煮秘方，深受大家喜愛。秘方是由一位老中醫傳授，當年為了調養自己的身體，特地選用五年鱸鰻作為藥引，經過長時間的精心熬煮。
直到創辦人岳父因腰酸背痛誤信偏方一病不起，岳父的離世給了創辦人極大的衝擊，他不禁反思，如果當初岳父能得到正確的食療調理，是否這樣的遺憾就能避免？正是這份遺憾與反思，促使創辦人決心研發出一款真正有效的養生食品，於是『鰻給力』應運而生。
-產學合作成為最給力的智慧營養補充品牌-
我們期盼『漁嗜嚐』是讓更多人看見鰻魚美好所在之品牌。為此，我們與各大產學單位合作，萃取出優質鰻魚營養元素 製作成易於人體吸收的保健食品，以真誠的心，呈現大自然最純粹的鰻魚營養。
我們認為健康該是從鞏固根本開始 從日常三餐、保健食品攝取做起。因此，我們期盼漁嗜嚐產品能從日常三餐、保健食品一點一滴，為你照顧好家人的健康，替每一位認真生活的你提供全力的支持，成為您最值得信賴的智慧營養補充品牌。
經營理念
/ 我們只要優秀人才，以保持團隊的競爭力，才能在這現實的世界生存下去，這很重要
/ 沒有老屁股文化，新品牌、新氣象，只要你夠強、夠積極、敢表現，新的舞台等你來發揮
/ 老闆不喜歡緊迫盯人，但在乎效率及成果，請你要有足夠的自律性，否則你只會浪費人生
/ 我們致力創造靈活、輕鬆的工作氛圍，討厭官腔，請你做自己、擁有自己的風格與態度，但並非為所欲為
/ 希望你有自己的人生目標，找到實現自己價值的舞台，不要只是混日子
/ 我們致力於正面！有效率！真誠的企業文化，讓你遠離烏煙瘴氣的負面職場

※UNME ZOO 提醒:要填寫心理測驗，才有入園聊聊資格唷。
【 空間｜實習生 】
我們正在尋找對空間設計充滿熱情、擅長學習與實踐的實習夥伴，無論你的背景為何，只要你願意探索設計可能、精進專業技能、參與實際專案，都歡迎加入。
這個職位適合正在學習空間設計、建築、室內設計，並希望透過實務經驗提升專業能力的你。你將參與空間設計專案的前期研究、設計發想、圖面繪製與專案執行，在真實商業環境中學習如何將設計轉化為可落地的解決方案。
我們重視學習力、執行力與設計思維，期待你在這段實習期間不僅能熟悉設計流程，更能培養獨立解決問題的能力、跨部門溝通能力與專案管理能力。UNME 以「用設計輔助好企業成長」為願景，這將是一個讓你親身參與設計產業、累積實戰經驗的絕佳機會。
requirements:
工作內容 
參與空間設計專案圖面製作與模型繪製材料與工法研究專案執行與協作
加分項目（非必要）
具備空間設計或建築相關學習背景熟悉 AI、PS 等設計軟體，能進行視覺呈現與渲染喜歡材料研究、關注創新工法與可持續設計具備良好的時間管理能力，能在多項任務間有效協調
技能需求
CAD、SketchUp（或其他建模工具）AI、PS（具備基礎視覺呈現能力更佳）具備設計思維，能將想法轉化為具體方案細心負責，具備良好的組織能力與學習動力
company_address: 台北市大安區敦化南路一段 192 號 13 樓
company_about:
｜UNME DESIGN 非我品牌空間設計｜ 
UNME 是間以「設計策略」出發的跨域設計公司，我們將設計的產出，實際與企業策略做銜接。利用創新的維度設計方法，協助企業打造一站式對外觸點的整體規劃。透過營運面的理解，將使用者體驗導入至每個場域的設計環節中。設計的過程與產出相對多元，需要有斜槓能力、邏輯清晰的強力夥伴。我們的服務包含「品牌規劃」、「設計服務」、「市場調查分析」、「運營策略顧問」等，滿足企業對外的經營需求。案件類型橫跨飯店品牌、啤酒工廠、普洱茶品牌、新創公司、食品品牌、企業總部、錄音室、餐酒館、健身餐品牌、生活百貨、重機品牌與店面、百貨專櫃等。
#以設計輔助營運#讓好企業被更多人看見。

title: Business Operation Internship 客戶經營行政實習生
company_name: inline 樂排股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About inline 
inline is a software startup focused on maximizing restaurant efficiency managing tables and reservations. We have thousands of restaurants including leading chain brands, Michelin-starred restaurants, shopping malls, and busy brick-and-mortar restaurants. We also partner with food-tech platforms, social apps, and various media services to grow the exposure and business for inline restaurant customers. Our team is launching and exploring more global opportunities in key cities, including Tokyo, Osaka, Hong Kong, Taiwan, Kuala Lumpur, Vancouver, Melbourne, Sydney and the cities in the US. For people with solid professional skills and talent, who are highly motivated to expand their career and learn in a fast, flexible environment, we have several opportunities to build the business with our team and write the legend inline for the next thousand partners at a rapid pace.
We are seeking a Business Operations Intern to join our team and enhance the efficiency of our Customer Success Management Team, as well as strengthen our client relationships through various tools and solutions. As a Business Ops Intern, you will work cross-functionally with teams including Revenue, Customer Support, and Business Development, collaborating closely to drive value for both inline and its clients. If you're looking to start your career in Operations or Customer Success Management, this is the perfect opportunity for you to shine.
What you'll do
Daily Operations
Organize and manage contract files for the CSM team, developing an automated archiving system to streamline file management.Record client information in internal forms, ensuring data consistency and accuracy across cross-functional documentation.Maintain and periodically update forms, regularly verifying the accuracy of all automated forms.Assist with data entry and organization of existing company contracts.Complete all processes related to contract scanning, categorization, and archiving.Complete additional tasks as assigned by supervisors.工作內容為 CSM 團隊整理和管理合約檔案，開發自動化歸檔系統以優化檔案管理流程。在內部表單中記錄客戶資訊，確保跨部門文件數據的一致性與準確性。維護並定期更新表單，定期檢查所有自動化表單的準確性。協助 key in 及整理公司內部既有合約完成所有合約掃描、分類、歸檔流程完成主管指派的其他任務。
requirements:
Basic Qualifications
Technical Skills: Advanced proficiency in Excel (complex formulas, pivot tables) and Google Apps Script and Python for data analysis and automation.Problem-Solving: Skilled in problem-solving with a focus on process improvement and operational efficiency.Communication: Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to engage effectively with others.Attention to Detail: Detail-oriented, with strong numerical sensitivity.Availability: Able to commit to 30 hours per week and a minimum 6-month engagement.Work Ethic: Self-motivated, capable of working independently, and has a strong sense of priority.工作技能
技術能力：熟練使用 google Office 套件，特別是 Excel。解決問題：擅長解決問題，專注於流程優化及提升營運效率。細心度：注重細節，具備高度數字敏感度。工作時間：每週至少 30 小時，實習期間至少 6 個月。工作態度：自律能獨立作業能獨立作業，具備良好的優先順序判斷能力。
company_address: 台北市北平東路30-1號5樓
company_about:

inline is a software business focused on maximizing restaurant efficiency managing tables and reservations. Nearly 10,000 restaurants across Asia-Pacific use inline's services, including leading chain brands, Michelin-starred restaurants, shopping malls, and busy brick-and-mortar restaurants. We also partner with food-tech platforms, social apps, and various media services to grow the exposure and business for inline restaurant customers.  The largest consumer booking business in the world, Booking Holdings (OpenTable, Agoda, KAYAK, Booking.com), is an investor and partner.

title: Quality Assurance Internship 品質測試實習生
company_name: inline 樂排股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
Inline is looking for a Quality Assurance Intern with a career interest in Software as a Service (SaaS) Engineer role.
inline makes restaurants smarter. Our software system was designed from the ground-up specifically for restaurants - it helps manage their tables, reservations, and in-person queues so they can focus purely on delivering the best experience possible for their patrons. The inline SaaS solution is used by thousands of restaurants around the world - from leading global chains to boutique Michelin star kitchens. Inline also partners with other leading food-tech platforms that direct traffic to our clients and increase their top-line growth. We've started off in Taiwan and have expanded to Hong Kong, Singapore, Japan, Canada, and the U.S.Inline正在尋找一位對軟體即服務（SaaS）工程師角色有職業興趣的品質保證實習生。
inline 是專注於改善餐廳工作效率與服務品質的 SaaS 新創公司，全台知名連鎖餐廳、大型百貨、與美食入口平台都選擇 inline 成為營運及擴展業務最重要的合作伙伴。inline 的急速成長來自於新創團隊獨有的創意、彈性、與追求帶給客戶方便簡單的核心價值！
希望你細心、具有良好的溝通、專案管理的能力及主動積極的態度，能不斷優化工作的流程同時也能積極達成主管及公司交付的專案、任務。
What you’ll do/learn:

Work independently and as a team member.Collaborate with multiple stakeholders to deliver high-quality and reliability products.Cooperate with QA Engineers in QA team to test inline App and servicesExecute test cases based on the test plan that you are assigned to.Take charge of functional release testing and user flow end-to-end testing.Dive deep into create test cases, executing test cases, troubleshooting product issue.Investigate product issues & release bugs and help with root cause analysis.
能夠獨立工作並作為QA團隊的一員。與多個職務角色合作，提供高品質和可靠的產品。與QA團隊的QA工程師合作，測試inline應用和服務。執行分配給您的測試計劃中的測試案例。負責功能釋出測試和用戶流程端對端測試。深入創建測試案例，執行測試案例，找出產品問題。調查產品問題和發布錯誤，並協助進行根本原因分析。
requirements:
Language Skills: Proficient in Chinese/Good in English (colleagues at Inline come from around the world, you need to work and communicate with overseas colleagues)Familiar with iOS devices and applicationsPossess time management and organizational skills, able to prioritize tasks based on their importanceWilling to grow with the company and achieve goals with startup team membersMinimum work hours per week: at least 20 hours (more than three days per week)


語言能力: 中文-精通/英文-良好 (inline 的同事來自世界各地，你需要和海外同事一起共事、溝通)熟悉 iOS 裝置與應用擁有時間管理及組織架構能力，能夠根據不同的任務安排優先順序願意和公司一起成長、和新創團隊的同仁達成目標一週上班時間至少20hr以上（每週三天以上)

company_name: Marvell Technology, Inc.
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
• Test program programming/ debugging/ correlation
• HVM Release to OSAT. Work with NPI Product & Test Engineering to ensure NPI meets production release requirements and successfully bring up at OSAT.
• Set SYL/SBL on new products using product yield history to ensure product quality.
• Disposition of production lots and work with NPI Product Engineering to drive yield improvement and test time reduction.
• Work with NPI Product & Test Engineering to stabilize and improve product screening at wafer-probe and package levels.
• Qualify and manage OSATs for capacity and competitive cost.
• Manage OSAT ATE HW inventory and maintain released test programs at OSAT.
• Set Quarterly Yield Standards based on yield trends.
• Support Supply Chain to meet customer delivery.
• Provide special customer requests on assembly and manufacturing related information.
• Review and monitor ETest/WAT data to proactively resolve yield issues.
requirements:
• Familiar with C / C++ /Python is desired. 
• Wafer sort analysis experience for analog devices up to 65GHz. 

• Understanding of DFm for SiGe and III-IV semiconductor technologies.
• Experience with complex data analysis using JMP, Galaxy, SiliconDash, or other standardized semiconductor tools. 

• Excellent data analysis skills using standardized semiconductor software tools are required. 
• Wafer sort, final test, and assembly yield analysis in solving manufacturing issues. 
• Familiar with test bench equipment, including, but not limited to, Network Analyzers, Sampling Oscilloscopes and Power Meters, is desired.
• The ability to clearly and concisely summarize engineering findings to a management audience is a must. 

• Self-motivated and action-oriented.
• Good English skill is desired (read/write/listen/speak).

主要以智慧製造 或 產品開發設計 或 材料應用為主要職涯規劃。

company_about:
復盛應用科技為全球最大之高爾夫球桿頭代工製造龍頭。
秉持實事求是，精益求精的理念，朝經營多角化，行銷國際化的策略積極創新，在市場趨勢變化中快速反應。近年來復盛應用將鈦合金鑄造的核心技術加以延伸，切入航太用品領域上，使得鈦合金技術可以多元化發展，並自創自有品牌生產純鈦隨行餐具等產品。
透過併購高爾夫球具零配件製造商，將該技術與本業產生垂直整合綜效，並加上併購擁有多項航太認證的航太零組件廠，展現復盛應用在航太產業發展的決心，藉由開拓其他利基市場，持續締造優良經營實績。
2018年底上市掛牌股票代號6670 ~精密、完美、極致，是我們不變的承諾。
在突破創新同時建立快樂員工的工作環境，和夥伴共同追求卓越、豐富人生!

title: 實習生-素材設計配置助理 (非短期寒暑假實習)
company_name: 玩美行動股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description: 【素材設計配置助理】招募中！我們誠摯邀請設計、產品體驗相關科系的學生加入美圖，並隨履歷附上您的作品集！【工作內容】：負責美圖秀秀的產品頁面配置，協助視覺美化與整體風格調整支援行銷宣傳及 VIP 訂閱相關設計素材製作進行各式 Banner 的調整尺寸及影片再製與團隊共同參與設計靈感交流，激發創意接洽海外創作者並協助合約執行&溝通檢視及修正設計稿件格式，確保符合品質要求完成設計主管交付的其他專案與任務【基本能力和加分項】：熟悉 Photoshop、Illustrator具備良好的設計美感頻繁使用 Instagram、TikTok 等社群平台對美感有一定想法、充滿熱情並樂於學習*此為半年以上長期實習職缺*須可配合進辦公室工作，且每週至少可排班20小時以上 (24小時以上尤佳)※不適用者不另行通知
requirements: 申請條件1. 此為半年以上長期實習職缺2. 喜歡關注流行時事熱點3. 領悟力高且喜歡主動思考4. 擅長溝通，能團隊合作
company_address: 台北市內湖區堤頂大道二段301號 10樓
company_about:
美圖公司的使命與願景是「讓每個人都能簡單變美」，「整合變美生態鏈，幫助用戶全方位變美」。2008年成立以來，以人工智慧為驅動，圍繞著“美”創造了一系列軟硬體產品如美圖秀秀、美顏相機、美拍、美圖魔鏡。
美圖公司於全球發展迅速，旗下APP目前已支援12種語言，全球累計超過10億使用者，於影像類應用排行上長期保持領先優勢。如今的美圖已不僅僅是「修圖」的代名詞，更是一個代表美麗、時尚與年輕的品牌。
玩美行動代理《美圖秀秀》、《美顏相機》兩知名APP並將之推廣至國際市場。團隊由產品、設計、行銷、商務與業務組成，成員皆來自不同經歷背景的優秀人才，我們鼓勵大夥發揮創意，勇於嘗試嘗新，因應結果有所學習並快速調整。
如果你希望能在最創新的手機APP產業中有所發揮，又期待能在如網美咖啡廳般的優美空間工作、有無限量的優質咖啡、茶水及零食點心可服用，還那麼巧的認同彈性上下班時間，喜歡公司不定期舉辦的有趣活動，信仰用力工作更用力玩….，那麼，玩美行動現正招募以下工作職位，歡迎熱情如你，手刀衝刺般的加入我們團隊！

company_name: 玩美行動股份有限公司

job_description: 本職缺將以【社群內容發想與製作】為核心，參與多款 APP 的社群媒體內容製作與創意發想 --- 打造最吸睛的社群素材，追蹤海外各市場的社群內容的趨勢，參與社群媒體的經營與優化，期待你可以透過自身創意與設計能力，為美圖旗下產品，打造獨具風格的社群內容!你的作品將有機會擴散到海外各社群平台，吸引更多陌生用戶目光，一同拓展美圖海外市場。加入我們，你將負責這些工作內容◆發想與製作多產品社群內容，舉例: 根據美圖秀秀主打功能，產製 Instagram Reels 等介紹產品，或根據新產品如 Starii 與 Winkit 等，製作社群貼文與影片等內容。◆追蹤海外社群創意，舉例: 韓國社群流行 GANADI 抱我狗狗、美國社群流行用絲襪來化妝變成大眼娃娃等。◆研究海外社群經營方式，舉例: 美國非亞裔用戶使用 TikTok 創作內容的習慣等。主管不定期的任務分配。必要技能：◆擅長使用各式平面與影像製作軟體，舉例但不限: Wink、手機鍵內各剪輯功能、Premiere 等。◆具備社群媒體素材的製作技能與經驗。如果你有以下技能與經驗，更加分：◆經營過個人、其他品牌、或網紅的社群平台，歡迎分享作品集。◆執行效率高、個性細心、負責任、且願意接受挑戰。◆善於人際溝通與跨部門團隊協作。◆設計、影像製作、大眾傳播相關科系尤佳

company_name: 玩美行動股份有限公司

job_description: 美圖產品用戶在全球皆高速增長，不斷求新求變、跟進AIGC趨勢，持續優化產品功能及用戶體驗，創造多國佳績！若你/妳熱衷在人事行政領域上累積經驗並且充滿滿滿滿的自信可以在這崗位上發揮，為了讓團隊能全力發展目標及戰略，我們期待妳/你的加入，協助建立讓團隊能夠心無旁騖的工作體驗，使每位夥伴可以全心往目標邁進，我們歡迎你的加入，一同放眼全球！【希望你能具備】1.具備行政服務、辦活動經驗，對人有高度熱忱、不怕生且能細心觀察到同仁的需求。2.做事俐落不拖泥帶水、具備高效執行力。3. 有獨立作業能力及執行力加分4.有實驗精神，勇於不斷嘗試新方法，能在快速高壓環境下維持高水準表現。5. 強大時間管理及優先順序管理技能6. 熟悉電腦操作，有基礎Excel報表整理能力7.需達到一周至少排班3個整天

title: Product Design Intern
company_name: 鑫享科技有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
[✨已招滿] 👶你將在3-6個月的實習計畫內，由資深設計師指導與陪伴，參與產品設計迭代，設計系統與文件維護，用戶研究與分析，同時也會與PM, 前後端工程師等跨團隊夥伴合作，累積實戰經驗。我們期待您熱衷於探索挑戰與保持熱情，是天生的合作者，也可以在團隊環境中獨立工作。
🫵實習計畫結束後將有機會參與內部考核，通過考核後即成為正職人員Product designer。歡迎對於 UX / UI 有興趣的你加入海碩集團之鑫享科技，一起打造百億級的跨國產品！🛥🛩🚝母公司海碩集團成立於1981年，承攬海空物流運輸集裝專業，迄今全球已有五十一家分公司，貨櫃量是全球泛太平洋航線裝載量排名第二大，版圖橫跨亞洲、美洲、歐洲，提供客戶完整的全球運輸網路系統服務。
實習過程中，你將獲得實作經驗
參與用戶研究與數據分析，釐清用戶需求參與需求轉化成解決方案的完整過程，與合作夥伴協作完成端到端設計向跨職能合作對象展示設計概念與細節說明與設計師或/和跨團隊的工程師，產品經理合作，獲取和徵求反饋與需求，以不斷提高產出的質量標準協助維護設計系統元件樣式與規範
requirements:
🤓必要條件
積極主動且擅長溝通邏輯清晰且具備良好的表達能力熟悉 Figma 操作技巧，有能力依據團隊需求製作介面與元件熟悉 Google Material Design與 Ant Design設計規範提供互動設計相關的線上作品集（必要！）
😎優先條件
設計、人機交互或相關領域的學士或碩士學位。熟悉設計系統有 UX 相關經驗視覺能力優異
🫡實習天數

實習天數一週 4 天以上為佳
company_address: 台北市松山區南京東路3段311號10樓
company_about:
[新創團隊]
　　作為新創的資訊團隊，透過有效率的專案互動進行交流、優質且獨特的新創積極文化、發揮團隊合作及執行力，目標協助企業打造整合先進的數位工作能力。
[新創思維]
　　以創新科技化技術導入傳統貨物運輸管理(Freight Management)服務 ，為客戶引入創新流程思維及架構。同時，在專案項目，如：Customer Portal, Cargowise等導入上，持續改善使用者體驗並提高企業客戶效能，進而推動企業數位化轉型需求。
公司理念
[關懷分享 放眼國際]
　　實現全球市場之海空航運企業為策略客戶，以雲端科技導入運用於貨物運輸管理服務客戶平台，透過優化流程，提升企業競爭力及企業實質收益
[團隊分工 以人為本]
　　團隊之間樂於溝通，並建立開放式跨部門合作集思廣益，發揮以人為本之精神，樂於接受多方意見。
[客戶導向 永續經營]
　　以客戶產業整體資源為導向，將數位化技術服務導入計畫，設定短中長期目標，並搭配各項專案策略逐步實行，期許達到永續經營理念，並提升客戶黏著度。
[多元挑戰 變中求進]
　　同仁在工作任務的多元挑戰下，能持續相互交流，不斷成長。營造多元工作環境；深信好的人才能為公司創造價值，將每位同仁視為公司重要資產，齊力維持，並期許吸引更多優秀人才加入團隊。

本職缺將以【海外市場推廣】為核心，可參與目前於海外市場成長迅速的 AI 影音 App Wink，主要專注在北美, 東亞與東南亞市場。若你是一位對 APP 有熱忱，也是一個細心、喜歡探索 AI 影像處理玩法的年輕人，歡迎投遞履歷加入美圖團隊！

◆製作常規的設計物料，包含平面與影片(40%時間)

◆善於人際溝通與跨部門團隊協作。
◆設計、影像製作、大眾傳播相關科系尤佳。
*此為半年以上長期實習職缺
*須可配合進辦公室工作，且每週至少可排班20小時以上 (24小時以上尤佳)

美圖公司於全球發展迅速，旗下APP目前已支援12種語言，全球累計超過10億使用者，於影像類應用排行上長期保持領先優勢。如今的美圖已不僅僅是「修圖」的代名詞，更是一個代表美麗、時尚與年輕的品牌。
玩美行動代理《美圖秀秀》、《美顏相機》兩知名APP並將之推廣至國際市場。團隊由產品、設計、行銷、商務與業務組成，成員皆來自不同經歷背景的優秀人才，我們鼓勵大夥發揮創意，勇於嘗試嘗新，因應結果有所學習並快速調整。

美圖公司於全球發展迅速，旗下APP目前已支援12種語言，全球累計超過10億使用者，於影像類應用排行上長期保持領先優勢。如今的美圖已不僅僅是「修圖」的代名詞，更是一個代表美麗、時尚與年輕的品牌。
玩美行動代理《美圖秀秀》、《美顏相機》兩知名APP並將之推廣至國際市場。團隊由產品、設計、行銷、商務與業務組成，成員皆來自不同經歷背景的優秀人才，我們鼓勵大夥發揮創意，勇於嘗試嘗新，因應結果有所學習並快速調整。
如果你希望能在最創新的手機APP產業中有所發揮，又期待能在如網美咖啡廳般的優美空間工作、有無限量的優質咖啡、茶水及零食點心可服用，還那麼巧的認同彈性上下班時間，喜歡公司不定期舉辦的有趣活動，信仰用力工作更用力玩….，那麼，玩美行動現正招募以下工作職位，歡迎熱情如你，手刀衝刺般的加入我們團隊！

title: 實習生-日本市場行銷助理(マーケティングインターンシップ) (非短期寒暑假實習)
company_name: 玩美行動股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description: 【日本市場行銷實習生】 招募中！熱烈歡迎日本籍在台學生加入！如果你熱愛拍照修圖、是社群媒體重度使用者、了解日本年輕人最新流行趨勢，歡迎投遞履歷！加入我們，你將負責或參與這些工作內容：◆官方社群經營 (IG/Twitter/Tiktok等)◆節慶推廣、文案撰寫、翻譯及視覺創意發想◆市場調查/趨勢蒐集/競品分析/用戶訪談◆網紅合作洽談◆App本地優化建議◆客服回覆 (商店評論、客服信箱)◆其他主管交辦事項或不定期測試 申請條件1. 須可配合進辦公室工作，且每週至少可排班20小時以上 (24小時以上尤佳)2. 須為日本藉身分，中文&日文 - 聽說讀寫精通流利3. 若具備優秀英文能力為加分4. 此為半年以上長期實習職缺※不適用者不另行通知【日本市場マーケティングインターンシップ】募集中！日本人の方、留学生大歓迎！写真加工アプリが好きな方、SNSをよく使う方、日本のトレンドを追うのが好きな方、ぜひご応募ください！仕事内容：◆Meitu及び関連アプリSNS運営 (IG/Twitter/Tiktokなど)◆プロモーションに関する企画考案、翻訳など◆日本市場のトレンド調査◆インフルエンサーとのタイアップ企画◆Meituアプリのローカライゼーション◆顧客対応(AppStore、メール返信など) 応募条件：1. オフィス勤務可能、週最低20時間以上の勤務が可能な方2. 日本国籍、中国語でのコミュニケーションができる3. 英語能力の証明も加点になります4. 半年以上の長期インターンシップ(短期不可)※書類審査に通過された方のみご連絡させていただきます。
requirements: - 具有當地生活經驗- 熟悉Instagram、tiktok、Dcard、小紅書等社群媒體- 善於溝通、組織統籌、態度積極學習- 對影像、短影片有高度熱情&想法idea- 熟悉影片剪輯 (App剪輯即可，但有專業影片剪輯能力加分。ex: AE, Premiere)
company_address: 台北市內湖區堤頂大道二段301號 10樓

title: 🍰【女生聲優實習生 Voice Actor Intern】— 加入我們，讓聲音為品牌說話！
company_name: 深智科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
🍰【女生聲優實習生 Voice Actor Intern】— 加入我們，讓聲音為品牌說話！
你對聲音表演充滿熱情嗎？是否擁有 甜美清亮、親切自然，或是像新聞播報一樣 專業沉穩 的聲線？我們正在尋找一位具備多變聲線、熱愛語音創作的 聲優實習生，一起打造未來的數位互動體驗！
🎙️【我們希望你具備這些聲音特質】

甜美清亮：適合品牌推廣與產品介紹
親切自然：能勝任虛擬接待、AI 助理等角色
新聞播報風格：聲音穩重、清晰、專業
青春活力感：用聲音傳遞正能量與溫度

✅【你將參與的任務】

錄製多種語音風格樣本（產品介紹、客服對話、廣告旁白等）
配合腳本完成錄音任務，進行聲音資料標記與修正
協助測試 AI 語音模型的表現，提供語音訓練素材
與設計師/AI 工程團隊合作，打造虛擬角色語音

🎯【我們希望你有】

喜愛聲音創作、具表演力與聲音辨識度
樂於接受指導，願意配合錄音與修正意見
基本錄音設備尤佳（如麥克風），或願意配合錄音棚錄製
可配合每週至少 2 天（實習期：3-6 個月，彈性可談）

💡【加分項目】

曾參與配音、廣播劇、Podcast、YouTube 或聲音創作作品
有基本剪輯能力（Audacity、Adobe Audition 佳）
熟悉不同語音風格切換、或具模仿能力

🌟【我們提供】

專業錄音資源與AI語音模型實戰經驗
實習證明與優秀實習生推薦信
參與大型品牌語音專案的實務經歷
可遠端工作，彈性時間安排

📨 請附上聲音樣本（MP3/WAV）或個人作品連結
🔎 投遞方式：透過 CakeResume 系統應徵
如果你相信自己的聲音能創造溫度與專業，歡迎加入我們，用聲音改變世界！
company_address: 台灣新北市中和中山路二段
company_about:
NexRetail 公司簡介
NexRetail 是一家專注於智慧零售技術的 AI 企業，致力於透過先進的影像辨識、邊緣運算 LLM、語音辨識與合成技術，為零售業提供創新的解決方案。我們與 Qualcomm、Nvidia 等科技領導品牌深度合作，並成功為 L'Oreal , McDonald's, JcDecaux 等全球知名品牌部署 Offline CRM 人流分析、虛擬助理 Kiosk、智慧數位看板 等應用，提升線下零售的運營效率與顧客體驗。
我們的核心技術涵蓋 Nvidia, Qualcomm  AI 平台，並專注於 AI 加速的影像分析與語音交互應用，為零售業帶來突破性的數據洞察與行銷優化方案。
目前，NexRetail 正在擴大團隊，尋找對 AI、智慧零售、電腦視覺、數據分析 充滿熱情的人才，共同打造下一代 AI 零售科技。如果你對 AI 技術與零售創新充滿興趣，歡迎加入我們！
🔹 更多資訊請參考： www.nexretail.com

title: 實習生Intern（數位資產管理公司）
company_name: 燦通國際資產管理股份有限公司
location: Kaohsiung City, Taiwan, Taipei City, Taiwan, Taichung City, Taiwan
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
FA部門：
投資分析實習生
職責： 協助投資經理投前、投後策劃與執行，如輸出Web3區塊鏈行業、市場分析報告，協助發掘高潛力投資項目。協助設計合理的投資策略，與創業者會談接洽等。
要求：專科、大學以上。熱愛投行與科技產業，具備一定的行業研究背景，良好的人際溝通和連結能力；完備的邏輯思維能力、收集數據與分析能力；有自驅力、合作精神、耐心與毅力。
投後管理實習生
職責： 協助安排被投企業/項目日程規劃，包含內外部活動與其他行程。協助準備路演材料/大綱，以及後續活動、協助投後管理等。
要求： 專科、大學以上。有一定的創業經驗或者有強烈的創業意願，具有高執行力、溝通協調能力、可靠細心、獨立思考能力。
投資者關係實習生
職責： 協助基金私募過程的材料準備，負責路演、投後服務等活動的策劃和執行，對新老LP關係進行日常維護。
要求： 專科、大學以上。豐富的活動籌劃經驗、經濟財務背景，對相關投資領域有一定了解。持有CFA，CPA或FRM證書優先。

RD部門：
數據分析實習生
職責： 協助大數據盡職調查團隊進行資訊搜集：Web3項目盡職調查的技術調查、團隊調查與市場調查。匯整資訊並透過大數據模型分析，將資料視覺化並依據分析結果撰寫報告。
要求： 專科、大學以上。資工專業、商業分析專業、科技管理專業，或具備分析實務經驗優先。對於基礎分析工具如：SPSS或SQL、Python、R語言等有基礎應用能力。
項目管理實習生
職責： 協助被投企業或者項目進行產品開發、區塊鏈技術開發。
要求： 專科、大學以上。協助專案經理工作，有區塊鏈背景知識與小規模專案開發經驗，對於區塊鏈技術產品有一定程度了解。工作嚴謹細心，有責任心。資訊管理科系優先。

BD部門：
品牌設計實習生
職責： 協助項目經理展開平面/多媒體設計工作，為被投標的品牌打造、產品推廣、活動策劃、品牌公關等業務製作物料與素材。
要求： 專科、大學以上。需有品牌設計相關專業或有相關工作經驗，具備品牌設計與表達能力（包含基礎圖文編輯、視頻剪輯等）。熟悉Ps、Ai、Cdr等常規設計軟件佳、有平面媒體或新聞傳播相關經驗佳。
公共關係實習生
職責： 協助公司和被投標的品牌/頻道/承接項目形象打造與維護管理，線上線下活動策劃、文稿內容撰寫、日常自媒體運營。協助項目經理或社群經理的網絡矩陣建立，包括媒體資源維護、溝通與開拓，執行行銷漏斗模型，分析行業動向等。
要求： 專科、大學以上。需具備較強的表達能力和寫作能力，會熟練使用各大社群媒體Facebook, Instagram, X, Youtube, Medium, Discord等及Word/Excel/PPT等Office辦公軟件，樂於即時吸收創新思維。
市場分析實習生
職責： 依據公司和被投標的總體運營方針，協助其市場戰略制定。參與市場調研與模型構建，進行品牌應用領域市場需求及商業模式分析，通過模型構建探索市場動向、制定市場戰略、建構行銷漏斗，並撰寫分析報告。
要求：專科、大學以上。商業分析、市場行銷與管理科系優先，具備一定數據分析思維。能主動關注產業動向，並具備高度機動性與執行力。

Admin部門：
人力資源實習生
職責： 協助發布職位招聘廣告，初步篩選應聘者簡歷，交付主管並協助安排面試時間。協助組織公司內部活動和團隊建設活動，促進員工關係。協助維護和更新人力資源系統和員工檔案，提供其他日常行政支持。
要求： 專科、大學以上。人力資源管理、工商管理、或相關科系優先。對於數位資產管理領域有所了解。有責任心、細心、良好文書和口頭溝通能力、組織能力與時間管理能力。

行政助理實習生
職責： 日常行政作業與輔助辦公室管理，包含公用品採買、行政聯絡、會議安排、收發信件、訪客接待、合作方聯繫等。輔助電子與紙本文書作業，包含協助編輯、校對、寄送報告和信函、複印文件等。必要時支援其他部門的內部聯繫與機動作業。
要求： 專科、大學以上。行政管理、資訊/商業/企業管理、文學、國際商務或相關科系優先。對於數位資產管理領域有所了解。有責任心、細心、良好文書和口頭溝通能力、組織能力與時間管理能力。

_____________________________________________________________________________________
★歡迎在學學生投遞（科系需與職務相符）。
★實習合約至少為20週，可作為大學學期實習，開立證明。
★實習期間依據工作配合時數與工作成果提供獎金。
★實習目的為提供學以致用、與職場接軌的實習機會。
★表現優秀之實習生更可以在畢業前取得任職轉任正式機會。
★採混合式（部分需出席公司、部分居家辦公），彈性度高。
_____________________________________________________________________________________
公司福利：
【職涯發展與工作生活平衡】
職涯加速器 - 提供專業培訓計畫，定向針對不同職級輔導、培訓。讓公司伴隨你／妳一起成長！
頂尖商務交流 - 提供參與企業座談會及各大論壇的機會識頂層商務人士、科技新貴，永遠保持靈敏，讓你／妳能精益求精、溫故知新。
高效充實生活 - 引入英國總公司工作機制。透過目標管理提升工作效能，有效跨時地工作，精準溝通，高效率效能完成任務！準時下班好心情！
【優越辦公環境】
松江民生金融商圈 - 諸多外商企業進駐的松江民生金融商圈核心，位於捷運行天宮站2號出口正上方，且門口就有公車站牌及U-Bike租借站，交通便捷讓你輕鬆到達辦公室。
【超幸福的辦公室】
舒適工作空間 - 辦公室配有獨立辦公桌和開放的工作空間，讓你在舒適中發揮創意。辦公室除了提供會議室、洽談區、影印機等完善設施，更是設有包含咖啡機與微波爐等便利家電的舒適休息區，打造高效又舒適的工作體驗！
快樂星期五 - 每週五下午Happy hour！有美味的蛋糕、啤酒和氣泡飲料，讓你在辛勤工作一周後，能夠放鬆心情，享受愉快時光。Work Hard, Play Hard！
company_address: 台北市中山區民生東路二段143號8樓（揚昇商業大樓）
company_about:
燦通國際資產管理股份有限公司（CTDAM）隸屬CT Global Asset Management Group燦通國際資產管理集團，國際據點包含北美區、歐洲區、大中華區，主要業務涉及國際資產管理與諮詢等。CT Digital Asset Management（CTDAM）是集團在大中華區股權投資孵化與私募基金管理公司，其中大中華區以台灣為據點，其下設有CT Consulting國際諮詢與CrypToDAM數位資產管理品牌。
CTDAM專注於一級市場早期項目的私募股權投資與孵化，主要投資賽道包含「數位轉型與金融科技」、「Web3與區塊鏈」、「大數據與AI」、「健康科技與智慧軟硬體」。基於數位科技與數位金融行業特性，構建了全新的數位資產管理與投融資服務流程，為數位領域start-up項目提供股權投資與全生命週期項目孵化服務支持、同時也為更多的領域合格投資者提供一個安全可靠的投資窗口。

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】Public Relations intern
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER Program：
LIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!
Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNp
Our Team:
Sculpture LITEON brand and make influence both internally and externally with comprehensive branding development strategy. Through synergy of PR, CSR, Marcom and Design functions, CBVD helps to enhance positive impact of LITEON brand value. It makes LITEON, a tech company, not only has dimensions, but also has warmth and brand recognition, which enables inheritance and transmission of LITEON spirit.  
•PR Division serves as an important bridge for communication between LITEON and its stakeholders. Through communication strategies, precise messaging, and timely crisis management, not only it strengthens corporate image by effectively conveying core values of the company but also adds value for the company by elevating corporate reputation. 
•CSR Division plays a key role in enhancing the company's sustainable brand image, amplifying its sustainable impact, and fostering the greater good of society by actively revealing sustainable information, engaging in dialogue and communication with critical stakeholders, and participating in social initiatives while establishing public welfare networks.  
•Marcom Division outlines the development strategy of brand value, shaping the consistency of internal and external perceptions of the LITEON brand. By integrating all communication channels, both online and offline, diverse digital platforms, and the company store, LITEON Collection, and by planning and executing marketing activities such as annual events and international exhibitions for business units, Marcom comprehensively enhance the all-around brand value and market competitiveness. 
•Design Division, centered around corporate brand and culture, tells stories through creative graphics/images and multimedia. It uses visual arts externally to create the charm and value of the LITEON brand, helping business units explore new business opportunities. Furthermore, internally, it injects brand spirit and vitality into corporate activities, showcasing corporate brand personality, and fostering employee identification and cohesion.
Goals:
1. Support Branding Strategies: Assist in developing and executing branding strategies to enhance brand visibility and engagement.2. Content Creation and Research: Create compelling content, conduct research, and analyze digital trends to inform strategic decisions.3. Collaboration and Consistency: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure brand consistency across all channels and support campaign planning and execution.4. Creative proposal for celebrating LITEON 50th Anniversary.Project Content:1.  Brand Immersion: A comprehensive brand immersion program will be arranged, including learning about LITEON brand, culture, history, business, and etc. The candidate will also be trained on LITEON brand voice and guidelines.Expand brand presence and influence: Q3 Branding Initiave and 50th Anniversary grand events2. Media Event & Insight of LITEON on media:
Active participation in upcoming media events. The project underscores the importance of understanding the media landscape and event planning. Leveraging these skills and experiences to convey the right messages about LITEON’s corporate values, initiatives, and achievements.
3. LITEON Sustainability Report Learning/CSR Event internal Promotion:
A deep dive into the report, which details the company’s environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance.Gain hands-on experience in promoting CSR events. Interns will be involved in various aspects of event promotion, in particular, internal communication. 
4. Corporate image communication via visual and message:
Assist in the production of brand digital material with creative messaging, and draft an internal promotion campaign via AI tools.The goal is to enhance the intern’s engagement for employee participation and corporate culture recognition, and understand how to leverage corporate visuals to convey company culture.
Milestones:
Week 1-2: Brand Immersion
Learn about LITEON’s brand, culture, history, business, etc.
Training on LITEON’s brand voice and guidelines
Week 3-4: Media Event & Planning
Participate in media events and understand the media landscape and event planning.
Production of digital contents with creative messages and AI tools
Week 5-6: Sustainability Report Learning and Internal Communication
Deep dive into the company’s environmental, social, and governance (ESG) performance report.Gain hands-on experience in promoting branding events, particularly for 50th Anniversary.
Week 7-8: Presentation
Leverage skills and experiences to convey LITEON’s corporate values, initiatives, and achievements.Consolidate the 2-month internship experience and reflections into a presentation.
Deliverables:
· Show the ability to demonstrate an understanding of LITEON’s brand voice and guidelines. · Understand the media landscape and be capable of drafting proper corporate messages. · Have the ability to grasp the key themes of the sustainability report. · Develop an internal communication plan and engagement strategy and leveraging different AI tools. · A final presentation.
requirements: Major:Communication/Marketing/BusinessAbility:1.Excellent communication skills: both written and verbal2.Creative thinking: the ability to develop innovative branding ideas3.Curiosity and passion: always in sync with the latest trends, and an enthusiast for new ideas and technologies4.Analytical Skills: Capable of researching and analyzing comprehensive data5.Fluent in both Chinese and English: with proficiency in writing and speaking in both languages6.Social media/AI savvy is a plus
company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】ESG Intern (Impact Assessment Analysis)
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:•Develop goals, strategies, and action plans related to the company's Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) aspects.•Address issues of concern raised by various stakeholders.•Promote sustainable development initiatives through internal and external communication integration.•Regularly report on implementation status to the Corporate Sustainability Development Committee.Goals:
•Evaluate LITEON Technology's positive and negative impacts in the ESG domain and provide specific improvement recommendations.•Utilize AI technology for data collection and analysis to calculate LITEON’s impact quantification (monetization).•Develop ESG communication strategies targeting different stakeholders to enhance the company's transparency and goal management in sustainability.Project Content:
•Literature and Model Research: Identify suitable parameters and formulas from existing literature and research models to lay the foundation for impact assessment.•Data Collection and Analysis: Use AI technology to collect data from external databases and analyze it to identify and quantify LITEON’s positive and negative impacts on ESG performance.•Quantitative Calculation: Apply the selected parameters and formulas to determine LITEON's monetized data regarding ESG impacts.•Benchmarking Studies: Collect and analyze assessment reports from a variety of benchmark companies to validate the reasonableness of the calculation results and learn from their successful cases.•Report Writing: Draft a detailed impact assessment report summarizing research findings and data analysis for external reporting.
Milestone:7/10 Project Proposal7/10~8/16 weekly meeting to make sure intern is on the right track8/20 Manager Presentation8/27 Department Presentation
Deliverables:•Impact Assessment Report•Other sustainability-related reports addressing stakeholder concerns
requirements:
Major:Economics、Accounting、Sustainability-related Fields
Hardskills•Basic knowledge of economic input-output analysis, capable of conducting impact quantification assessments.•Excellent language skills (reading and writing), able to understand and analyze international research literature and reports. Strong English reading and writing skills, capable of understanding and writing literature and reports related to environmental and ESG topics.Softskills•Good time management skills, effectively planning and organizing work progress.•Attention to detail and analytical ability, enabling precise data handling and report writing.

company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER Program
LIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing

Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:•Develop goals, strategies, and action plans related to the company's Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) aspects.•Address issues of concern raised by various stakeholders.•Promote sustainable development initiatives through internal and external communication integration.•Regularly report on implementation status to the Corporate Sustainability Development Committee.Goals:•Conduct climate-related scenario analyses to quantify the company’s environmental impact data.•Integrate carbon data calculations and produce results to respond to carbon disclosure questionnaires and engage in external communication regarding environmental performance.•Assist in enhancing the company's transparency regarding sustainability information and goal management.
Project Content:
•Policy and Regulation Research: Investigate domestic and international policies and regulations related to carbon management to ensure that the company’s carbon management actions comply with regulatory requirements.•Carbon Emission Data Collection and Analysis: Assist in collecting the company’s carbon emission data and conducting data analysis to identify key areas for carbon reduction.•Carbon Inventory: Participate in the company's carbon inventory efforts to ensure the accuracy and completeness of carbon emission data.•Climate-Related Scenario Analysis: Evaluate how different climate scenarios impact the company's business operations and environmental performance, predicting potential future climate challenges and opportunities.•Report Writing: Draft reports and documents related to carbon management to report progress to internal and external stakeholders, ensuring accuracy and completeness in responses to carbon disclosure questionnaires based on the calculated and analyzed results.
Milestone:7/10 Project Proposal7/10~8/16 weekly meeting to make sure intern is on the right track8/20 Manager Presentation8/27 Department Presentation
Deliverables:
•Response document for the carbon disclosure questionnaire•Reports on carbon data calculations and climate scenario analyses
requirements:
Major:Environmental Engineering、Environmental Science
Hardskills•Background in environmental engineering, capable of integrating and analyzing carbon data.•Proficient in climate-related data and tools, enabling the execution of quantitative analyses and modeling.•Strong English reading and writing skills, capable of understanding and writing literature and reports related to environmental topics.Softskills•Good time management skills, effectively planning and organizing work progress.•Attention to detail and analytical ability, enabling precise data handling and report writing.

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】AI Software intern (magnetic components model)
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
location: Xinzhuang District, New Taipei City, Taiwan
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNp
Our Team:
ATDI focuses on the development of advanced technologies that were previously unavailable. By integrating multiple physical field and data-driven technologies through a digital twin environment, it combines innovations from different product domains to spark new ideas.
Goals:
By recruiting outstanding interdisciplinary interns, we aim to investigate and consolidate existing literature on the modeling and design techniques using AI for the chracteristics of magnetic components. Through the integration of AI technology and electromagnetic analysis techniques, we will try to develop a prototype of trained model for predicting magnetic component properties.Project Content:
1. Survey and organize the modeling techniques for magnetic components from reference papers. 2. Operate the BH curve trasor equipment to measure the characteristics of magnetic components.3. Evaluate, analyze, and process the measured results of the magnetic components.4. Design the magnetic components using simulation tools.5. Train an AI model of magnetic components charateristics. 6. Validate the prediction result of AI model.Milestone:
-7/11 Finish the report for surveying and organizing the magnetic charateristics model and magnetic components mesurement.-7/19 Finish the data preprocessing to train the AI model for magnetic components.-8/2 Finish the AI model training and validation for the magnetic component characteristics.-8/7 Finish the report for LIGHT SEEKER program.
Deliverables:
1. The report for characteristics models from reference papers.2. Measurement data for the characteristics of magnetic components.3. Organized data for AI training. 4. Trained AI model for magnetic component characteristics.
requirements: Major:Electrical Engineering/Electronics Engineering<Hardskills>1. Electromagnetic Analysis and Design.■ Understand the basic theorems for electrical and magnetic design.■ Design the electrical circuits and magnetic components using simulation tools.2. Electromagnetic Characteristics prediction using AI models.■Understand the basic concept and methods for AI model training.■Understand the basic theorems for electromagnetic characteristic.3. Magnetic Component Characteristic Measurement and Analysis.■ Operate the BH curve trasor equipment to measure the characteristics of magnetic components.■ Evaluate and analyze the measured results of the magnetic components.

Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fab
LITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNp
Goal:
AOI+AI intelligent identification system to reduce equipment misjudgment and improve product quality.

Project Content:
1. Collect high-quality image data and annotate the images.2. Select an appropriate AI model and train the model using the prepared dataset.3. Evaluate the model's performance using the test dataset.4. System integration and deployment.5. Regularly update and optimize the model based on production needs and newly discovered defect types.

Milestone:
-7/11 AI Project Proposal-7/25 Verify the proposal structure and ensure the quality of the proposal-8/20 Proposal demo and presentation to the department-8/25 Review of the work output of the past two months

Deliverables:
Delivery achievements, including:1. Annotated images with labels indicating relevant features or defects.2. Evaluation report detailing the model's performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall, etc.).3. Deployed model within the existing inspection system.4. Performance comparison reports before and after updates.5. Documentation of newly discovered defect types and corresponding model adjustments.
requirements: Major:-Information Engineering<Hardskills>-Understanding of machine learning and deep learning algorithms.-Experience with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).-Proficiency in model evaluation metrics (e.g., accuracy, precision, recall, F1 score).<Softskills>-Adapting to new tools and technologies as required.-Staying updated with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.-Working with cross-functional teams for system integration and deployment.-Addressing integration challenges and optimizing system performance.
company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

Goal:
Establish Omniverse digital twin virtual factory and AI application.

Integrate the model into the existing inspection system to ensure compatibility with production line equipment.

Documentation of the integration process and any adjustments made to ensure compatibility.

company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNp
Our Team:The AI and Data Application Office is committed to harnessing the power of artificial intelligence and data analytics to propel innovation and efficiency within our production and operational spheres. Our mission is to transform complex datasets into actionable insights, refine and enhance processes, and implement state-of-the-art AI solutions to improve manufacturing operations, elevate product quality, and drive cost efficiency. We strive to empower employees with user-friendly visual tools that enable informed decision-making and foster a culture of data-driven choices across the organization. Additionally, we are dedicated to integrating the latest technologies to systematically address and resolve challenges across various functional units. By strategically collaborating with industry leaders such as Microsoft, Google, and NVIDIA, we ensure that the most advanced AI and data analytics solutions are embedded into our processes.
The AI&DA Office is also an industry-recognized, award-winning team. We are the winner of the [IDC Future Enterprise Award 2024: Special Award for Digital Innovation]. You can read more in the press release here: https://money.udn.com/money/story/11799/8371742?from=edn_newestlist_cate_side
Goals:Develop an AI-workflow to collect, analyze, and interpret external industry and market information. Provide actionable insights and decision support to drive strategic planning and operational effectiveness.
Project Content:1) Data Source Evaluation: Identify and assess external data sources critical to LITEON's business sectors, ensuring relevancy and quality for actionable insights.2) AI Workflow Optimization: Develop an AI-driven workflow to streamline the process from data collection to visualization, enhancing efficiency and speed.3) Advanced AI Model Development: Create sophisticated AI models that can effectively aggregate and analyze vast amounts of diverse data to uncover trends, opportunities, and risks.4) User-Centric Visualization Tools: Design intuitive dashboards and visualization tools that present insights clearly and accessibly, empowering decision-makers with actionable information.5) Promotion and Training: Promote the AI agent's capabilities across relevant departments and conduct training sessions to maximize effective use and integration into decision-making processes.
Milestone:
7/11: Data Collection Framework Established7/25: Data Modeling & Visualization Completed8/8: Report Submission8/25: Final Presentation and Feedback Session
Deliverables:1) AI Workflow Framework: Documentation of the developed AI workflow, illustrating streamlined processes from data collection to visualization, and detailing efficiency improvements.2) Visualization Dashboards: A suite of user-friendly dashboards and visualization tools that demonstrate how insights are presented to support decision-making processes.3) AI&DA Project Presentation: A comprehensive presentation summarizing the project's objectives, methodologies, outcomes, and insights.
requirements:
Major: Computer Science Information Management Engineering-related Fields<Hardskills>1) Programming and Data Analysis: Proficiency in programming languages(e.g., Python, C/C++, R, or Java,...). Experience with data analysis tools or libraries(e.g., Pandas, NumPy, ...) and visualization tool(e.g., Power BI).
2) Machine Learning and AI: Knowledge of GenAI and machine learning algorithms and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, ....). Understanding of data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation techniques.<Softskills>
1) Analytical Thinking and Problem Solving: Strong problem-solving skills with an innovative approach to developing AI solutions.
2) Communication and Teamwork: Effective communication skills for collaborating with cross-functional teams. Ability to present findings and ideas clearly and engagingly to both technical and non-technical audiences.

We leverage the latest advancements in AI, including Generative AI (GenAI), Large Multimodal Model (LMM), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), fine-tuning, and model distillation. Goals:Within the next two months, you will work with AI Team to develop a personal AI document assistant.This assistant should be able to:1. Automatically synchronize with employee document directories to maintain an up-to-date knowledge base.2. Enable fast and intuitive document retrieval through natural language queries.Organize related information from multiple documents in a coherent and accessible manner.3. Generate creative ideas and suggestions based on document content.4. Provide in-depth analysis and insights to help employees explore their information more deeply.By leveraging cutting-edge generative AI technologies, the assistant will streamline document-related tasks, boost efficiency, and foster innovation in the workplace.
Project Content:
"Personal AI Document Assistant" will be developed with the following key components, leveraging various generative AI technologies:1. Automatic Document Sync & Management:  Sync employees' document directories in real-time via cloud technology, supporting formats like PDF, Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.2. Intelligent Search & Recommendations:  Offer semantic search powered by AI, allowing natural language queries, and recommend relevant documents based on user behavior.3. Information Organization & Summarization:  Generate document summaries and key points using generative AI, with correlation analysis for quick context understanding.4. Creative Ideation & Insight Discovery:  Integrate Large Multimodal Models for brainstorming and Q&A, and use knowledge graphs to uncover hidden insights.5. Internal Promotion Activities: Host a launch event, provide training and guides, offer incentives, collect feedback, and promote through internal campaigns.
Milestone:
7/4: Learing basic structure of webapp.7/11: Connect webapp and personal colud storage.8/1: Convert personal documents into RAG database.8/8: Query corresponding contents based on user's question and documents.8/15: Deploy webapp to k8s system as a service.8/22: Final testing and debug before go live.8/29: Release Personal AI Document Assistant
Deliverables:1. Personal AI Document Assistant System2. Personal AI Document Assistant source code3. Personal AI Document Assistant manual
requirements: Major:Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics<Hardskills>Must have: python, database(SQL)Nice to have: docker, k8s, DevOps, Azure cloud service

experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:
LITEON Efficient Infrastructure (EI) focuses on developing and optimizing solar energy storage technologies to enhance solar energy utilization efficiency, reduce carbon emissions, and support the adoption of renewable energy.
Goals:
Interns will research and deploy AI technologies and tools to help EI teams to increase productivity and improve product experience. 
Project Content:Successful candidate can pick one or more of the projects below to work on
1. Automated Market Research Using AI Agents: This project aims to automate the market research process using AI agents, helping the team efficiently collect and analyze market information. Interns will utilize AI technology to automatically gather and organize key data on competitors, regulations, and industry trends, reducing manual research time and improving decision-making accuracy.2. Sales Tool - AI Camera for Site Assessment and Installation Recommendations: This project leverages AI image recognition technology to automatically analyze installation environments and provide optimal ESS (Energy Storage System) installation recommendations. The goal is to enhance sales efficiency and optimize customer experience.3. AI Camera for Automated Bill Analysis and Key Information Extraction: This project uses AI OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology to automatically parse electricity bills and extract key data. It helps users quickly understand their energy consumption patterns and provides energy-saving suggestions to improve energy management efficiency.4. AI Tool for Accelerating the Coding Process: This project explores methods to utilize AI for accelerating the coding process, enhancing productivity and efficiency in software development.5. AI Tool for Software Quality Checks and Regression Testing: This project investigates the use of AI to perform software quality checks, such as regression testing, to ensure the reliability and performance of software applications.6. AI Tool for Monitoring Household Data and Detecting Abnormalities: This project focuses on using AI to monitor household energy data, detect abnormalities, and identify potential savings, aiming to improve home energy use and efficiency.
Milestone:
1. Project Initiation: Start selected project(s) and begin research, data collection and analysis.2. Mid-Project Review: Analyze progress, refine methods, and draft initial findings.3. Final Report, Tool/App Demo, and Presentation: Complete the project report(s), develop and demonstrate a tool or app, and prepare presentation materials.
Deliverables:
1. Project Report(s): Detailed analysis and recommendations.2. Presentation Materials: Summary of findings.3. Tool or App Demo: Demonstration of the developed tool or app.4. Internship Summary: Reflection and suggestions for improvement.
requirements: Major:Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field.<Hardskills>Technical Skills: Programming, AI/ML frameworks, data analysis, solar energy systems.Analytical Skills: Data collection and analysis, market research, trend identification.Communication Skills: Written and verbal communication, report writing, presentation skills.<Softskills>Problem-Solving Skills: Methodical approach, innovative solutions.Teamwork: Effective collaboration, adaptability, openness to feedback.Project Management: Time management, task prioritization, organizational skills.

The Accounting Department ensures the accuracy of transaction information and provides data for decision-making. By leveraging AI technology, the department aims to detect abnormal transactions effectively.
Goals:
By using AI to analyze large volumes of transaction data and detect unusual patterns and suspicious activities, the efficiency and accuracy of financial monitoring are enhanced.

job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER Program：
LIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!
Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNp

Our Team:
The HCM (Human Capital Management) team is responsible for designing and implementing training programs that enhance employees' skills, knowledge, and career growth for LITEON "Sustainable Talent Development" mission. We are leveraging cutting-edge technologies, including AI-driven solutions, to provide personalized and efficient learning experiences. Our goal is to create a culture of continuous learning and professional development within the organization.
Goals:
Develop an AI-powered Learning Support chatbot that serves as an intelligent assistant for employees, providing instant answers to questions related to training topics, company policies, and career development. The chatbot will also recommend relevant learning resources, track employees' progress, and send reminders for training deadlines.
Project Content:
1. AI Chatbot Development & Integration – Collaborate with the tech team to design and develop an AI chatbot using natural language processing (NLP) to answer employee queries effectively.2. Content & Knowledge Base Management – Curate and structure training materials, company policies, and learning resources for chatbot responses.3. Personalized Learning Recommendations – Implement AI-driven algorithms to suggest training programs based on employees’ roles, skills, and career aspirations.4. Progress Tracking & Reporting – Develop dashboards to monitor chatbot interactions, employee learning progress, and engagement levels.5. User Testing & Optimization – Conduct testing sessions, collect feedback from employees, and refine the chatbot’s performance to improve user experience.
Milestone:- 7/10: Research AI chatbot solutions, define key use cases, and begin chatbot development.- 7/25: Integrate chatbot with the learning platform, upload training content, and develop initial AI models.- 8/8: Conduct user testing, gather feedback, and optimize chatbot responses.- 8/15: Launch the chatbot pilot program, monitor usage, and refine features based on insights.Deliverables:
AI Learning Support Chatbot
requirements: Major:- HR major with IT backgroud or IT Major with Learning knowledge.- Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in HR, Business, Data Science, AI, Computer Science, Learning & Development, or a related field.Ability:• Interest in AI applications for HR, employee training, and digital transformation.• Basic understanding of AI, machine learning, or chatbot development is a plus.• Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, Tableau, or other data visualization tools is preferred.• Strong analytical, communication, and project management skills.• Experience with LMS platforms or HR systems is a bonus.

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】AI Software Intern (Flow Chart Copilot)
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:
Center of Core Competence (CCC) is a LITEON department for developing key technologies for future products. SD stands for "software development". SD2 is the team answering the question "how intelligence techonology and service generate new and competitive opportunities on market".
Goals:
Flowcharts and state machine plots are essential in various industries and office environments for visualizing processes, workflows, and decision-making paths. They simplify complex procedures, improve communication, and ensure consistency. In hardware design, they map out circuits and logic flows. However, errors like causality mistakes, logical inconsistencies, and input-output mismatches can cause inefficiencies and design flaws. This project aims to develop an AI-driven system to detect these errors, enhancing process accuracy and efficiency.
Project Content:
1. Defining problem and data generation:Assuming the user draws working flow charts for tasks in a resturant, define the errors could be happened on flow charts with reasoning. Generate labeled flow charts by hand or in generator for model training or testing.2. AI Models Development:Design and train AI model candidates (might be computer-vision) to identify defined errors in flowcharts and state machine plots.3. Model Self-Optimiztion Pipline:By using semi-supervised-learning, active-learning, and so on, build a pipline for automatively optimizing the error-detection model, working with the flow chart generator.4. Methodology Analysis: Compare among different models or compare among self-optimizaiton methods. Analyse the pros and cons over all possible combinations.
Milestone:
- 7/9 Project Proposal- 7/18 at-least-3 models for error detection- 8/1 at-least-2 self-optimization method piplines- 8/15 Experiment report over all possible combinations of model and self-optimization method pipline- 8/25 Review the work output of the past two months
Deliverables:
1. AI Models error detection: Trained AI models capable of detecting errors in flowcharts and state machine plots.2. Self-optimization method piplines: end-to-end pipline for AI model evolves for better accuracy.3. Experiment desing and report, and methodology analysis report.
requirements:
Major:
STEM related field
<Hardskills>
Python, Machine Learning, Statistics Analysis, Mathematics, Logic Analysis, Stock Market Knowlodge

title: 【LIGHT SEEKER 全英文暑期實習計畫】AI Software Intern (Energy Trading)
company_name: LITEON_光寶科技股份有限公司
experience: No requirement for relevant working experience
job_description:
About LIGHT SEEKER ProgramLIGHT SEEKER is LITEON Technology's all-English summer internship program.This year, we've taken it up a notch by adding more exciting elements and diverse training courses. You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing
Join us on Friday, April 11th for the LITEON DAY online live briefing. We will introduce the internship program to provide you with more detailed information.
Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:
Center of Core Competence (CCC) is a LITEON department for developing key technologies for future products. SD stands for "software development". SD2 is the team answering the question "how intelligence techonology and service generate new and competitive opportunities on market".
Goals:
The purpose of this project is for testing multi-Agent concept on informative and rapid-evolving application scenario, like trading. The goal is to develop and implement an AI-driven residential energy trading agent system capable of tracking electricity tariff or price, power load or generation prediction, and finally making autonomous trading decisions, with the aim of maximizing returns or minimizing electricity net-cost.
Project Content:
1. Literature Review and data search:Study present AI-based trading algorithms and basic residential energy management. Search the relevant data for model building. 2. AI Models Design and Development:Train AI models to predict price, tariff, power load, power generation. etc. And, Implement decentralized multi-Agent system for making energy trading decisions. 3. System Optimization based on historical data or simulation:Test the system as a whole on the historical data or simulation, with an index to measure the performance of this system (performance index). Optimize each algorithm according to the performance index.4. System performance analysis:Analyse the performance of the energy trading system in different residential scenarios, for knowing the limit of this system.5. Assessment report:Analyze the performance and identify areas for improvement.
Milestone:
- 7/11 Project proposal- 8/01 An optimized multi-Agent system (including prediction and decision making)- 8/22 An experiment report for multi-Agent system conducting trading over different residential scenarios.- 8/25 Review the work output of the past two months
Deliverables:
1. Research Report: A comprehensive document detailing findings from the literature review and research phase.2. AI Models: Trained AI models capable of predicting all trends in this residential energy management system and making trading decisions.3. Performance Report: A detailed report on the performance of the AI trading agent and areas for improvement.
requirements:
Major:
STEM related field
<Hardskills>Python, Machine Learning, Statistics Analysis, Mathematics, Logic Analysis

You'll have the chance to connect with interns from around the world, and through departmental internships, you'll deeply explore LITEON, discover your true self, identify what you truly value, and even have the opportunity to secure a pre-offer!Wanna know more about LIGHT SEEKER >> Check it outMandarin version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af95fd897800019ca395English version: https://vocus.cc/article/6756af6efd897800019c9fabLITEON DAY Online Live Briefing

Fill out the talent pool registration form now to sign up for the briefing!>> https://forms.office.com/r/dtK0UTRXdNpOur Team:
Center of Core Competence (CCC) is a LITEON department for developing key technologies for future products. SD stands for "software development". SD2 is the team answering the question "how intelligence techonology and service generate new and competitive opportunities on market".
Goals:
To pioneer the development and implementation of cutting-edge AI-driven techniques (AI Agent) for executing cyber attacks on Ethernet switches and wireless AP/Routers, with the ultimate aim of uncovering vulnerabilities and fortifying network security.
Project Content:
1. Literature Review:Study AI-based cyber attack methods and network device vulnerabilities for defining a set of attack methods equiped to AI Agent.   2. AI Model Development:Design and train AI models to simulate the assigned cyber attacks.3. Simulation and Testing:Test AI models in a controlled environment against various network setups.4. Vulnerability Analysis:Identify and report on network device weaknesses.5. Mitigation Strategies:Propose and test countermeasures to enhance security.
Milestone:
1. 7/11 Project Proposal2. 8/1 Model and its test report of cyber-Attact AI Agent3. 8/22 A experiment report for AI cyber attack experiment in all assigned scene and conditions4. 8/25 Review the work output of the past two months
Deliverables:
1. Research Report: A comprehensive document detailing findings from the literature review and research phase.2. AI Models: Trained AI models capable of simulating cyber attacks on network devices.3. Vulnerability Report: Detailed design of the experiments conducted, including methodologies and setups. A detailed report on identified vulnerabilities and their potential impact.

company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝

company_address: 臺北市內湖區瑞光路392號
company_about: 光寶科技（LITEON Technology）成立於 1975 年，不僅是台灣首家上市的電子公司，也是台灣 LED 產業的先驅。近半世紀以來，我們憑藉卓越的光電半導體與電源管理技術，立基全球市場。近年來，我們以「能源」為主要策略，以光、電、智慧、互聯為核心科技，專注於四大領域解決方案並致力於打造 IoE（Internet of Energy）：	•	Green Data Centers 綠色資料中心	•	Clean Mobility 潔能運輸	•	Efficient Infrastructure 高效能基礎設施	•	Smart Life 智能生活┃企業永續觀點與承諾光寶秉持「光電節能、環境永續」的經營願景，堅信永續發展是企業不可推卸的責任。我們不僅追求營收與獲利成長，更積極推動企業永續，承擔社會與環境責任。面對全球環境與氣候變遷的挑戰，光寶早在二十年前便開始對接國際規範與倡議，推動永續治理。在產品開發上，我們將低碳設計作為核心，設定目標—所有下一代產品碳排放降低 5%。同時，我們攜手供應鏈夥伴，以實際行動推動產業與社會的可持續發展，發揮關鍵影響力。┃以人為本的策略藍圖人，是光寶最重視的核心價值。我們珍視每位員工、夥伴與客戶，相信能透過科技釋放無限可能，為全球環境與人類生活帶來正向改變。同時，我們致力於打造多元共融的工作環境，提供健全的福利制度、透明的溝通管道、豐富的內部資源與個人成長機會，鼓勵夥伴發揮所長、突破框架，以「當責」的態度實現個人與企業願景。光寶科技不僅是一家企業，更是一個大家庭。我們在全球設有多達334個據點，緊密連結亞洲、美洲、歐洲等地的30,000位團隊成員。無論身處何處，只要是光寶人，都是您的家人！⚝光寶科技誠摯邀請您加入我們的大家庭！讓我們一同攜手向光前行！⚝
